biotools.summary: Package that offers an environment for estimating the mutagenetic trees mixture models from cross-sectional data and using them for various predictions. It includes functions for fitting the trees mixture models, likelihood computations, model comparisons, waiting time estimations, stability analysis, etc.

bioschemas.name: Rtreemix
bioschemas.summary: Package that offers an environment for estimating the mutagenetic trees mixture models from cross-sectional data and using them for various predictions. It includes functions for fitting the trees mixture models, likelihood computations, model comparisons, waiting time estimations, stability analysis, etc.
